content.prompt: Suppose the Boolean expression  j < numList.size()  in line 4 of the method is replaced with  j <= numList.size() - 1.  Which of the following best explains the effect of this change?

choices.label: It has no effect on the behavior of the method.
It causes the method to ignore the last element in numList.
It changes the number of times the loop executes, but all elements in numList will still be accessed.

skill.text: 4.A: Describe the behavior of a code segment or program.
